ask_name: Could I have your name, please?
doctor_ask_doctor_name: What doctor would you like to see?
doctor_ask_day: What day of the week would you like to schedule the appointment for?
doctor_ask_start_time: At what time can you be at the clinic?
doctor_ask_end_time: How long would you like to see the doctor for?
doctor_ask_symptoms: Could you describe your symptoms, please?
doctor_inform_booking_unavailable: Unfortunately {doctor_name:s} has no appointment available at {time:d} o'clock.
doctor_inform_booking_available: Alright, {doctor_name:s} is available at {time:d} o'clock. Can I book the appointment for you?
doctor_inform_booking_successful: Great, your appointment with {doctor_name:s} is booked for you!
anything_else: Is there anything else that I can do for you?
out_of_scope: I am sorry, I don't quite understand what you mean. I am only able to help you book an appointment with your doctor.
